article:
On a Saturday morning, I went camping in Green Natural Park with some friends. We were happy because it was a sunny day. All the way there, we sang songs and made jokes. _ , in the afternoon, when we finished our picnic at one o'clock, it was dark and windy. Soon, it started to rain. Unluckily, none of us brought a(n) _ . We ran about but couldn't find any places to _ .
Twenty minutes passed and it was still raining. There was a long way to go _ we reached the campsite  . It was _ worse because our compass   showed that we went the wrong way.
We had to make a quick decision because it was raining heavily. Chris said we could set up a tent   to hide in, so Mary and Tom _ to set up the tent. Chris and I tried to make a fire to keep us warm. But we were not able to light the fire, because everything was _ . We dried ourselves, talked and waited inside the tent. At about five o'clock, it stopped raining. We _ to stop the camping trip because all of us were very tired.
This camping trip might not be very _ but we got to know each other better. And the most important thing I've learned from this trip is the importance of team spirit.
